about_the_game:
• Fast paced reactive combat 

  • Wave based enemies with unique moves each increasing in difficulty

  • Advanced bossfights that don't care about your stats

  • Decorate your own island and enhance your home which acts as the games' storage system

  • Work on secondary skills and systems to enhance the power of your character: Farming, Alchemy, Fishing, Smithing and much more to come

  • Gather equipment to change up your build

  • Unlock new attack combo's/styles and ultimate abilities throughout your journey

  • Personalize your characters by grinding out pets, outfits and character auras

Combat should never be boring and require your focus at all times, that's why instead of having the player choose a class, you get to utilize each combat style at once! Quick swapping between melee, magic and ranged allows for mixing in a lot actions at once, increasing involvement and clearing out monsters in style!

Each category of enemy you encounter in the world will have plenty of variants jumping into the fray to hit you with surprise mechanics! You will clear waves of these invaders in each room until you find the leader of that specific category!


Getting to a boss and being able to finish it should feel satisfying at all times. Because we believe in the concept of making sure bosses should always be challenging, in this game you will not actually be able to out-level a boss to be able to cheese through it! Player stats aren't relevant in these fights and are a true test of skill and using your toolkit! Is that not enough for you? 

Fear not! For each boss will have a hardcore version available with instakill mechanics that will be sure to keep you on your toes!

How can one feel at home in a game without actually having a home? And why should you stop there? Enjoy a magical floating island that you can customize using all sorts of art assets that you encounter throughout your journey! You'll also unlock more floating islands as you progress further!

Need a break from cutting through your enemies? Why not get stronger while doing that as well? Skills will give you passive combat increases and unlock various ingredients needed to upgrade other systems as well as materials to purchase furniture for your player owned island!

You like shiny things? So do crows but don't let that stop you! At the end of every set of waves you slap a crystal which will reward you with a random piece of loot! Mix and match to get the build you want and try to get the rarest drops on the tables!

Sometimes you just want to stop and admire. Unlock various outfits, pets and auras throughout your journey that will show off your progression and challenges in a fun way! And yes these will be shown off when multiplayer comes around (soon!) as well!

- A form of multiplayer. The gameplay itself is meant to be done solo, but we are almost ready to release the first phase of the multiplayer experience. It will be a "visual multiplayer" where you'll be able to see and talk to other players, no matter where in the world you currently are!

- New skills will be added over time and upon the release of each new continent!

- Controller support already exists in a basic form. While the game is playable with a controller, certain features are still missing on it and it's not very smooth to navigate a menu. This will be iterated upon further down the line.

- Content that gets added as you go. For this Early Access release you will have access to the first two continents of the game, the Weathered Woods and The Empire! We will gradually release new areas and bosses for you to progress through. Below is a sneak peek at what the world map looks like currently!

We hope you'll enjoy your stay! Come help us shape the game at our Discord, let us know your thoughts or just join us for a conversation!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains fantasy violence and animated blood. Not all language used in the game may be suitable for children.

name: Incursion2D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5+ or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD 7600 (or greater)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No

short_description: A fast paced action RPG where you will fight increasingly difficult waves of enemies, each with unique abilities! You will be fighting various bosses, work on your secondary skills, collect cosmetics for your character and work on your very own island!
